title: Strategies for Utilizing Remote Laboratories in Inquiry-Based STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science and engineering concepts and experimental design methodologies
context.additional_context: An online course providing inquiry-based learning environments using Remote Access Laboratories (RAL) for graduate-level STEM learners, with core goals of enhancing experimental design autonomy and collaboration

learning_goals: Students will complete the design of three independent STEM experiments using the RAL platform.
Students will write an inquiry report solving two complex problems through collaboration with peers.
Learners will derive at least three scientific conclusions based on quantitative analysis of experimental data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
